content.raw:
mm I have not experienced it before. I'll try it on a different machine and a different mouse to see if I can reproduce it.

The err msg is printed when the mouse click does not intersect with an object in the scene. It was meant to illustrate the mouse ray query functionality in the example program but it's probably more of a distraction. I'll remove it.
